stimulusHtml: Suppose the  for  loop initialization  int j = 0  in line 4 of the method is replaced with  int j = 1. Which of the following best explains the effect of this change?

features.html:
Consider the following method  findValue,  which returns  true  if  key  is found in the  ArrayList  words  and returns  false  otherwise. 

 

public static boolean findValue(ArrayList<String> words,
                                String key)
{
   for (int j = 0; j < words.size(); j++)      // Line 4
   {
      if (words.get(j).equals(key))
      {
         return true;
      }
   }
   return false;
}

choicesHtml: It will have no effect on the behavior of the method.
It will cause the method to return a different result when  key  is not in  words.
It will cause the method to return a different result when  key  is found only at the first index in  words.
It will cause the method to return a different result when  key  is found only at the last index in the list.
